name: Ric Olie
Lore: 'Leader of Bravo Squadron. Piloted Amidala''s Royal Starship from Naboo so that she could plead her case to the Senate. Was able to break the blockade with a little help.',
Text: 'Adds 3 to power of anything he pilots (or adds 4 if Queen''s Royal Starship). While piloting Queen''s Royal Starship, once during a battle Ric is in, may use X Force to reduce attrition against you by X.',
